work_experience.responsibilities: Assisted in customizing and improving website interfaces using Wordpress. Integrated Gmail API via Google Console to enable automated email notifications to administrators. Explored the company's PHP-based web applications for better understanding of system development.

projects.name: REAL ESTATE WEBSITE
projects.description: Developed a full-stack real estate marketplace where users can create paid property listings, browse properties, and communicate through an integrated chat system. Designed optimized database schema and developed RESTful APIs with advanced filtering. Implemented JWT authentication/authorization, caching (Caffeine + Redis), and RabbitMQ for async task handling. Integrated VNPay sandbox for payments, Spring Mail for email, Google Drive API for storage, and Google Cloud Vision for image analysis. Developed a responsive UI with real-time chat (WebSocket) and lead capture forms. Wrote unit tests with JUnit & Mockito to ensure reliability.

projects.name: IBANKING APPLICATION – TUITION PAYMENT SUBSYSTEM
projects.description: Developed a tuition payment micro-subsystem as part of a larger iBanking application, responsible for handling all logic related to student payments. Built using Python with modular design to ensure maintainability and testability. Containerized via Docker / docker-compose for consistent development and deployment environments. Designed database schema and implemented RESTful APIs to interact with frontend or other subsystems. Included dependency management and automated tests to ensure system reliability.

projects.name: LAPTOP SHOP APP
projects.description: Developed an e-commerce web application for laptop shopping using Laravel 10, MySQL 8, TailwindCSS, and Flowbite. Features for users: search laptops by name/price, manage shopping cart, place orders, view shipment status. Features for admins: add/edit/delete laptops, manage users, update order status, lock user accounts.
